:CodeSample: Ray.Intersect Mesh.Intersect ### Ray Mesh Intersection Here's an example of casting a Ray at a mesh someplace in world space, transforming it into model space, calculating the intersection point, and displaying it back in world space.
![Ray Mesh Intersection]({{site.url}}/img/screenshots/RayMeshIntersect.jpg)
